reasoning: Colon cancer (excluding rectum) accounts for ~70% of colorectal cancer. GLOBOCAN 2002 data shows global colorectal cancer incidence ~25 per 100k, yielding colon-specific rate of ~17.5 per 100k.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
